snippet: The former University of Texas women’s track coach Bev Kearney is pursuing race and gender discrimination complaints against the university.
abstract: Former University of Texas women's track coach Bev Kearney files race and gender discrimination complaints against the university; Kearney, who is black, resigned in January as Texas prepared to fire her for an inappropriate relationship with one of her athletes in 2002; Texas later revealed that assistant football coach Major Applewhite, who is white, was allowed to keep his job after having inappropriate relationship with a student trainer.
lead_paragraph: The former University of Texas women’s track coach Bev Kearney is pursuing race and gender discrimination complaints against the university.

headline.main: Former Texas Track Coach Files Complaints
